name: part_006
file: tmp_【#ラミィ生誕3Dヒーローショー】雪花ラミィ生誕３DLIVE『 ホロレンジャー』ゲスト＆告知あり！【 雪花ラミィ ⧸ホロライブ】 [mjXO5WWADww]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Yukihana Lamy apologizes to Daifuku as she leaves for her performance.
Daifuku laments being ignored as a mysterious energy descends.
Title card for Holo Ranger 3D Hero Show.
Holo Ranger transition sequence showing the guest silhouettes.
Yukihana Lamy, Momosuzu Nene, Omaru Polka, and Shishiro Botan perform 'Kizuna ♡ Speciality'.

subtitles.original: あ、ごめんね、だいふく。
subtitles.english: Oh, sorry, Daifuku.

subtitles.original: 今、忙しいの。
subtitles.english: I'm busy right now.

subtitles.original: 後で構ってあげるから。
subtitles.english: I'll play with you later.

subtitles.original: あぁ...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: なんで...
subtitles.english: Why...

subtitles.original: なんで僕だけ見てくれないんだ...
subtitles.english: Why won't anyone look at me...

subtitles.original: ダラッタッタラッタ ダラッタッタラッタ
subtitles.english: Dara-da-da-da... Dara-da-da-da...

subtitles.original: 時には僕らを理想を語る非凡な才能旅人で
subtitles.english: Sometimes we're extraordinary travelers who speak of ideals

subtitles.original: またはキャピタリズムに屈する傀儡の癒し恋人で
subtitles.english: Or submissive puppet lovers yielding to capitalism

subtitles.original: または虚像が書かれたボードを掲げるデモの一員で
subtitles.english: Or members of a protest holding boards with illusions

subtitles.original: いわば貴方にとっての優しい法螺吹き歩くオオカミ少年だ
subtitles.english: In other words, I'm just a kind-hearted lying boy to you

subtitles.original: 名声を
subtitles.english: Fame

subtitles.original: 体裁を
subtitles.english: Decency

subtitles.original: 人生そのものを潰し合おう
subtitles.english: Let's crush our lives together

subtitles.original: 恨んで 恨んで
subtitles.english: Resent me, resent me

subtitles.original: 恨んでもたまに悔やんで
subtitles.english: Sometimes even regreting resenting me

subtitles.original: 描きたい存在に背中をそそられる
subtitles.english: The existence I want to draw lures me in

subtitles.original: 燃やして 燃やして
subtitles.english: Burn it, burn it

subtitles.original: 燃やしても手が震えて
subtitles.english: Even as I burn it, my hands tremble

subtitles.original: 嘘をハッタリをどうぞ重ねて着込んだんだ
subtitles.english: Please, keep layering on the lies and bluffs

subtitles.original: 分かって 分かって
subtitles.english: Understand, understand

subtitles.original: 分かって僕の正義を
subtitles.english: Understand my sense of justice

subtitles.original: 無能な怪物を教理で燃やした
subtitles.english: Burned the incompetent monster with doctrine

subtitles.original: 妬んで 妬んで
subtitles.english: Envy me, envy me

subtitles.original: 妬んでいるまま選んだ
subtitles.english: I chose it while still envying

subtitles.original: その程度のちゃちな正解はいらない
subtitles.english: I don't need such a cheap right answer

subtitles.original: ダラッタッタラッタ ダラッタッタラッタ
subtitles.english: Dara-da-da-da... Dara-da-da-da...

subtitles.original: 時には僕らは希望を託す聖人じみた歌人で
subtitles.english: Sometimes we're saint-like poets entrusted with hope

subtitles.original: またはキャピタリズムを隠した見た目だけの置物で
subtitles.english: Or just ornamental figures hiding capitalism

subtitles.original: または全てに噛み付く振りした得意なエキストラで
subtitles.english: Or clever extras pretending to bite at everything

subtitles.original: やはり貴方にとっての優しい法螺吹き歩くオオカミ少年だろう
subtitles.english: You probably still see me as a kind-hearted lying boy

subtitles.original: 現状の
subtitles.english: The current

subtitles.original: 展望も
subtitles.english: Outlook

subtitles.original: 変貌も何もかもが無価値なんだ
subtitles.english: Transformation, everything is worthless

subtitles.original: 存在を
subtitles.english: Existence

subtitles.original: 本能を
subtitles.english: Instinct

subtitles.original: 人生そのものを潰し合おう
subtitles.english: Let's crush our lives together

subtitles.original: 恨んで 恨んで
subtitles.english: Resent me, resent me

subtitles.original: 恨んでもたまに悔やんで
subtitles.english: Sometimes even regreting resenting me

subtitles.original: 描きたい存在に背中をそそられる
subtitles.english: The existence I want to draw lures me in

subtitles.original: 燃やして 燃やして
subtitles.english: Burn it, burn it

subtitles.original: 燃やしても手が震えて
subtitles.english: Even as I burn it, my hands tremble

subtitles.original: 嘘をハッタリをどうぞ重ねて着込んだんだ
subtitles.english: Please, keep layering on the lies and bluffs

subtitles.original: 分かって 分かって
subtitles.english: Understand, understand

subtitles.original: 分かって僕の正義を
subtitles.english: Understand my sense of justice

subtitles.original: 無能な怪物を教理で燃やした
subtitles.english: Burned the incompetent monster with doctrine

subtitles.original: 妬んで 妬んで
subtitles.english: Envy me, envy me

subtitles.original: 妬んでいるまま選んだ
subtitles.english: I chose it while still envying

subtitles.original: その程度のちゃちな正解はいらない
subtitles.english: I don't need such a cheap right answer

subtitles.original: その程度のちゃちな正解はいらない
subtitles.english: I don't need such a cheap right answer

subtitles.original: ダラッタッタラッタ ダラッタッタラッタ
subtitles.english: Dara-da-da-da... Dara-da-da-da...

subtitles.original: 時には僕らは思想を諭す英雄的な歌人で
subtitles.english: Sometimes we're heroic poets who teach ideologies

subtitles.original: つまり貴方にとってのカリスマ気取った極悪非道なペテン師だ
subtitles.english: In short, I'm just a wicked charlatan acting charismatic to you

subtitles.original: ねえ、生まれてから今日までの間 どれくらいのごはんで
subtitles.english: Hey, since the day I was born, how many meals

subtitles.original: わたしたちはできてるかな 毎日ありがとう
subtitles.english: Have made us who we are? Thank you for every day

subtitles.original: もし食卓から おいしいが消えてしまったら ああ、迷わずに
subtitles.english: If deliciousness ever vanished from the table, ah, without hesitation

subtitles.original: どこにいたって 何をしてたって 取り戻しにいこう
subtitles.english: No matter where we are or what we're doing, let's go get it back

subtitles.original: あれは記念日の記憶
subtitles.english: That's the memory of an anniversary

subtitles.original: 何気ないあの味も
subtitles.english: And that casual taste too

subtitles.original: 忘れたりしない
subtitles.english: I'll never forget

subtitles.original: ずーっと一緒だよって 伝えなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I have to tell you we'll be together forever

subtitles.original: 守りたいこの味は キミと笑いあう毎日の
subtitles.english: The taste I want to protect is from our days of laughing together

subtitles.original: いちばん傍で照らす あたたかい道しるべなんだ
subtitles.english: The warmest guide, shining closest to us

subtitles.original: みんなと 今を熱くするオモイ 育んでこれからも
subtitles.english: Nurturing the feelings that heat up the present with everyone, from now on too

subtitles.original: 大切に刻もう キズナで結ぶスペシャリティ
subtitles.english: Let's treasure every moment, a specialty bound by our bonds
